Ok, macOS remains the only CI that fails the `scoped_addr` case (macOS 11 doesn't pass and macOS 10.14 doesn't run the tests).
 
```
test/net_tests.cpp:311: error: in "net_tests/cnetaddr_basic": check addr_str == scoped_addr has failed
```

Re-pushing to test the inverse.
Ok, all the CI runs except macOS failed as expected, except ARM64 Android APK which also passed. Closing.
